allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(tools\): apply golden rule - remove context IDs from tool inputs

BREAKING CHANGE: Tool-Input models no longer contain business context IDs.
All identifiers now come exclusively from ToolContext \(scope + business\).

Changes:
- RetrieveInput: Removed collection_id, workflow_id, visibility_override_allowed
- FrameworkAnalysisInput: Removed document_collection_id, document_id
- WebSearchContext: DELETED, replaced with ToolContext
- retrieve.py:run\(\): Reads from context.business instead of params
- FrameworkAnalysisGraph: Signature changed to accept ToolContext
- WebSearchWorker: Uses ToolContext, worker_call_id in metadata

Golden Rule Enforced:
- Tool-Inputs contain only functional parameters
- Context contains Scope, Business, and Runtime Permissions
- Tool-Run functions read identifiers exclusively from context, not params
- Fallback logic \(params.X or context.X\) eliminated

Related: OPTION_A_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md Phase 2, OPTION_A_SOURCE_CODE_ANALYSIS.md

EOF
\)")
